chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance (non_coacc_kill d (predta_coacc_states d a)) a t

Premises:
predta_coacc_states = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool
ad = N : Set
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait
non_coacc_kill = fix non_coacc_kill (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) {struct m} : preDTA := match d with | @M0 _ => match m with | @M0 _ | _ => M0 state end | @M1 _ a s => match m with | @M1 _ a' b => if (a =? a')%N && b then M1 state a s else M0 state | _ => M0 state end | @M2 _ x y => match m with | @M2 _ z t => M2 state (non_coacc_kill x z) (non_coacc_kill y t) | _ => M0 state end end : preDTA -> Map bool -> preDTA
rec_co : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance_co d a a t
rec_co_rec : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a0 t -> reconnaissance d a t
rec_co_def_3 = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance d a t -> reconnaissance_co d a a t : term -> Prop
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
dta_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> Prop
rec_nonco_kill : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a0 t -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> reconnaissance_co (predta_kill_non_coacc d a0) a a0 t
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
semantic_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t
predta_kill_non_coacc_rev : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (m : Map bool), reconnaissance (non_coacc_kill p m) a t -> ensemble_base state p m -> reconnaissance p a t
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
rec_co_9 : forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (l : prec_list), liste_reconnait d l tl -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance_co d0 a0 a0 u) -> (forall b : ad, prec_occur l b -> coacc d a b) -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> liste_reconnait_co d l a tl
sem_equiv_prop_t = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t : term -> Prop
predta_coacc_fix : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc_states d a) a0 = Some true < -> coacc d a a0
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list)...
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (...
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
rec_co_def_4 = fun (d : preDTA) (l : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => forall a : ad, preDTA_ref_ok d -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad), preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance_co d0 a0 a0 u) -> (forall b : ad, prec_occur l b -> coacc d a b) -> liste_reconnait_co d l a tl : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
rec_co_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co d a a1 t -> coacc d a0 a1 -> reconnaissance_co d a a0 t
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
reconnaissance_co_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a b : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait_co d ladj b t -> coacc d b a -> P d a b t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance_co p a a0 t -> P p a a0 t
predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_0 : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop
rec_co_7 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> rec_co_def_4 d la tl -> rec_co_def_4 d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)

```coq
intros d a t H1 H2.
rewrite <- (predta_kill_non_coacc_rev d a t (predta_coacc_states d a) H2).
apply rec_co.
apply H1.
Qed.

original: intros d a t H1 H2. rewrite <- (predta_kill_non_coacc_rev d a t (predta_coacc_states d a) H2). apply rec_co. apply H1.
